main event: Various civilians reported UFO sightings at Hickam AFB, Hawaii on multiple occasions in December 1950.
interesting points: The first sighting involved three objects maneuvering like fighter aircraft at a high altitude of 6,000 feet., The second sighting involved an aerial object with an orange flame trailing it travelling over 300 mph and observed for 30-45 seconds., Both sightings were reported on different dates within the same month., The incidents occurred at different times, one at night and one in the morning., The sightings were documented in Project Blue Book, indicating official military interest.
sighted object: three unidentified flying objects and an aerial object with an orange flame
witness description: various civilians and a USAF pilot
